description: Manage and configure Azure firewall policy rule collection group.

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group create
commands.summary: Create an Azure firewall policy rule collection group.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group create --name
                                                        --policy-name
                                                        --priority
                                                        --resource-group
                                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group delete
commands.summary: Delete an Azure Firewall policy rule collection group.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group delete [--ids]
                                                        [--name]
                                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                        [--policy-name]
                                                        [--resource-group]
                                                        [--subscription]
                                                        [--yes]

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group list
commands.summary: List all Azure firewall policy rule collection groups.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group list --policy-name
                                                      --resource-group
                                                      [--max-items]
                                                      [--next-token]

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group show
commands.summary: Show an Azure firewall policy rule collection group.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group show [--ids]
                                                      [--name]
                                                      [--policy-name]
                                                      [--resource-group]
                                                      [--subscription]

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group update
commands.summary: Update an Azure firewall policy rule collection group.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group update [--add]
                                                        [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                        [--ids]
                                                        [--name]
                                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                        [--policy-name]
                                                        [--priority]
                                                        [--remove]
                                                        [--resource-group]
                                                        [--set]
                                                        [--subscription]
                                                        [--tags]

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group wait [--created]
                                                      [--custom]
                                                      [--deleted]
                                                      [--exists]
                                                      [--ids]
                                                      [--interval]
                                                      [--name]
                                                      [--policy-name]
                                                      [--resource-group]
                                                      [--subscription]
                                                      [--timeout]
                                                      [--updated]
